column5: Has anyone recently fished Little Clay Lake north of Vermilion bay?If so, what can you tell me about this lake?How deep is this lake?How is the Walleye fishing
https://www.walleyecentral.com/forums...rchid=11571522Give the link a look, looks like you have posted on one of them! Good luck!
Fishing is great.hard to get a boat in there.max depth about 25ft..good walleye and pike action.do some guided trips in there.if interested pm me.
